channel.description: Logically, without the influence of religion, even though most of it is bullshit, i don't really believe anything is going to happen besides chaos, but chaos isn't a bad thing because when chaos happens, there is no order and when there is no order there are no rules and when there are no rules its time to have some fun, regardless if the world will really end or not, there would be so much chaos in the world that you could do whatever the hell you feel like.... but ahaha what i'm really trying to say is how logical is going to be that the world is going to end... seriously... i know the ancient mayans were like very advanced and shit but i believe its all bullshit no matter what influence. what are other peoples opinions?

item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:20, topic:240233”]Where do people even get this shit about 2012 from? Their ass?

Mayans knew how to calculate the position of planets, thats all.[/quote]

Actually, you’re correct, and I’m pretty sure people are not aware of what the myans were speaking of, which would actually be the position of the Earth and the sun in 2012, of which the sun would have an explosion on it’s surface and the harmful chemicals and particles and what not is what would harm our technology today.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:40, topic:240233”][quote author=cocoa link=topic=316541.msg2619998#msg2619998 date=1231305552]

I have no reason to belive in god unless I have undoubtable truth…

Do you believe in, say, black holes?

You can see black holes.
[/quote]

You can’t, but at the same time you can. Black holes are so dense, that light isn’t mirrored by it. So you can’t see it. But because stuff around it does mirror light, you can see it.[/quote]
http://spiff.rit.edu/classes/phys301/lectures/black_hole/black_hole.html

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Mike_, post:32, topic:240233”]Watch the history channel this week. 'tis on armegeddon week. i’ve been watching that chan for a few weeks now and ive been waiting for armegeddon week cause 2012 interests me

Lots of proof from ancient profits/cultures.[/quote]

There are so many cultures that have foreseen the end of the earth. Just because the Aztecs/Mayans are better known, doesn’t mean it’s true. Their calender ends in 2012: Big deal. Who the hell makes a calender thats different every year in the first place? You have to draw the line somewhere.

Read full topic
